title: Yuusha Gojo Kumiai Kouryuugata Keijiban - Novel Updates
genre: Adventure   Comedy   Fantasy   Shounen   Slice of Life
tags: Adapted to Manga   Chat Rooms   Demon Lord   Episodic   Fantasy World   Heroes   Immortals   Magic   Multiple Protagonists   Neet   Parallel Worlds   Parody   Royalty   Senpai-Kouhai Relationship   Transported to Another World   World Hopping
author: Okemura   おけむら
description:
The hero union's BBS, where heroes gather, crossing many dimensions. A bulletin board made by heroes for heroes. Unfair settings, complaints about comrades, tales of failure, and discussions of secret agendas, they are all found here! Even now, new threads are being made!

A comedic chronicles about the travails of heroes.>
